Class Space

java.lang.Object
Space
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueSpace, EndSpace, GreenSpace, MagentaSpace, OrangeSpace, StartSpace
public abstract class Space
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines the very building-block of the game, the Space.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected static int count
    This attribute statically stores the count of how many spaces have been created.
    int ID
    This attribute stores this instance's space ID.
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
    This attribute stores the list of players standing on this space at a time.

  • Field Details

    • count

      protected static int count
      This attribute statically stores the count of how many spaces have been created. This is used for the Space ID system.

    • ID

      public final int ID
      This attribute stores this instance's space ID.

    • players

      protected java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
      This attribute stores the list of players standing on this space at a time.

  • Method Details

    • playerLand

      public void playerLand​(Player player)

    • playerLeave

      public void playerLeave​(Player player)

    • event

      protected abstract void event​(Player player)
      This method is to be implemented by child classes of this class. It will be called by the playerLand() method upon a player lands on this instance.
      Parameters:
      player - - the player that this event will be executed on

    • setNextSpace

      public void setNextSpace​(Space space)
      This setter method sets this space's next space. This is called by the initSpaces() method in the Path class.
      Parameters:
      space - : Space - sets the next space in the path

    • getNextSpace

      public Space getNextSpace()
      This getter method returns the instance for the next space from this space instance.
      Returns:
      nextSpace : the next space after this space on the path

    • getNoOfPlayers

      public int getNoOfPlayers()
      This getter method returns the number of players on this space.
      Returns:
      nPlayers : int - the number of players on this path

    • getPath

      public Path getPath()
      This getter method returns the path this space belongs.
      Returns:
      path
